price: Kana ganin mãsu yawa daga gare su, sunã jiɓintar waɗanda suka kãfirta. Haƙĩƙa tir da abin da rãyukansu suka gabãtar sabõda su, watau Allah Yã yi fushi da su, kuma a cikin azãba su mãsu dawwama ne
arabic: تَرَىٰ كَثِيرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ يَتَوَلَّوۡنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ لَهُمۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ أَن سَخِطَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَفِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ هُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: tarā kathīran min'hum yatawallawna alladhīna kafarū labi'sa mā qaddamat lahum anfusuhum an sakhiṭa al-lahu ʿalayhim wafī al-ʿadhābi hum khālidūna
